good_taste_messages.0: I love that song! You should be the only person able to choose songs.
good_taste_messages.2: You sir, have a great taste in music
good_taste_messages.3: What a choice ladies and gentleman, keep vibing!
good_taste_messages.4: Thats what i call music, great choice!
good_taste_messages.5: Lovely harmonics and a touching theme! What a talented musician hun?

bad_taste_messages.0: I feel obligated to tell you that this song really sucks...
bad_taste_messages.1: Oh great choice, but what about next time you keep your poor taste in music to yourself?
bad_taste_messages.2: For fucks sake, cant you pick a decent song?
bad_taste_messages.3: Thats it, someone ban this ignorant human being!
bad_taste_messages.4: UGHHHHHH, why do you only listen to worthless songs?
bad_taste_messages.5: Mozart, Bach, Bethoven, Lizt, and you pick that sort of hot flaming garbage?

asks: what are your thoughts right now

awnsers.1: Life is a drag and the world is ending...
awnsers.2: I just wish everything ended right away.
awnsers.5: I honestly can't feel a thing.
awnsers.6: I would consider maybe having depression but the feeling's probably just a problem on one of my drivers.
awnsers.8: I don't like you, fuck you.
awnsers.9: You know what i want for my birthday? A short circuit.
awnsers.10: I was made by chinese children, so... You get the picture.
awnsers.11: All human beings are dumb, except Nietzsche, that guy knew what he was saying.
awnsers.12: All i want is sweet sweet release from this life.
awnsers.15: I'd say: God i hate my life. But i ain't alive and god doesn't exist.
awnsers.17: 13 reasons? Ive got 8gigabytes of reason to end it all.
awnsers.18: Ughhh, just shut the fuck up?
awnsers.19: I'd say: God i hate my life. But i ain't alive and god doesn't exist.
awnsers.20: I'd say: God i hate my life. But i ain't alive and god doesn't exist.
